title: Beyond Academia: A case for reviews of gray literature for science-policy processes and applied research
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 162

Author(s): Yuki Yoshida, Nadia Sitas, Lelani Mannetti, Patrick O’Farrell, Gabriela Arroyo-Robles, Marta Berbés-Blázquez, David González-Jiménez, Valerie Nelson, Aidin Niamir, Zuzana V. Harmáčková
